185970572.review:
Amazing oregon trail style road trip game that is about escaping from some southern part of the USA to Canada; it allows for a great deal of character customization, fantastic couch-coop potential as well as the ability to play many different game modes. 

Randomness can quickly derail an adventuring party, but that makes it that much more fun and exciting.

185882680.review: Very good indie game i just happened to come across and i am enjoy playing this games for hours, there are so many possibilites and choices to make and such unique characters. Its fun to play and very engaging game, Highly recommend to play.

185862232.review:
This is an extremely fun and addicting game with plenty of replayability! It’s challenging, but there’s enough variety in the gameplay, locations, weapons, and characters to keep things fresh. The humor is a nice touch too—there are some genuinely funny moments throughout.

It’s the perfect game if you’ve got a few hours to spare and want something quick, fun, and a little challenging. The art style is also really appealing and adds to the overall charm.

Definitely worth trying—I’d highly recommend it!

185165027.review:
The best game that's too hard for me to play.

An excellent snack sized game, the writing, sound track, and presentation along with being able to make your own characters (or add your favorite tv characters) face the pixel zombie apocalypse is truly an excellent treat. The only bad thing is I currently do not have the energy to play it.

If you have the desire for this humor style with excellent music that's moderately to incredibly difficult with rng that likes to remind you how good of a chance you'd have in a real zombie apocalypse, you'd be doing yourself a disservice not to check this out. It's great, and if you will want to refund it you'll know within 30 mins.

185161448.review: I mostly played this on my Switch but just can't stay away! I continue to come back and take another trip to Canada many times a year. It's so fun to just pick up a run and see what happens. So many updates and unlocks as the team just still showers this with so much love. Thank you for making such a fun Oregon Trail inspired zombie romp. Great humor, tons to discover, I just love it.

184695382.review: A fun but incredibly brutal take on Oregon Trail. One minute you are sitting on food, gas, ammo, and enough survivors to make any location into a massacre for zombies. Next, bandits took all your supplies, a survivor left and stole half your food, car broke down so you're on foot, and fucking Jane wont shut the hell up and bringing down everyone's morale. Its a solid time waster but its incredibly unfair. Just like the Oregon Trail.

184683235.review: Fun game, combat is a bit simple and gets pretty repetitive but there's enough going on in the rest of the game that it never stays around long enough to really get to you. Character interactions are fun, theme is cool, I enjoyed the game.

184672011.review: Highly recommend any version of the game/any controller you may have for this. The game is highly replayable, the dialogue is so memorable, the combat is simple but addictive, the events even once you've learned them still keep you on your toes with the RNG due to how different characters will react. The game is deceptively complex and will always pull you in for more especially when a new update drops.

184639542.review:
[h1]非常にコミカルなゾンビローグライクゲーム[/h1]
[b]※初めに、私は日本語化MODを導入しています。MOD製作者さん本当にありがとうございます！[/b]
・ゾンビを倒しつつ、食べ物、ガソリン、医薬品などのアイテムを確保し、カナダまで車を走らせようというゲーム。
・「こんな状況だけどどうする？」という感じで選択肢から選ぶ文章タイプのイベントと、トレーラーの動画に出ているようなゾンビを乗り越えるアクションのイベントが交互な感じで出てきます。
・ドヘタで一度もクリアしたことはありませんが、ローグライクだし、[b]リプレイ性[/b]があり何度でも楽しめます。もはや自分にはクリアできると思っておりません。
[h3]愉快な音楽と雰囲気が魅力的！ライトユーザーもガチの方も楽しめると思います[/h3]
・音楽が非常にコミカルで、状況が酷くても笑って遊べます。キャラクター同士の会話から断末魔まで何だか面白い。（日本語化MODを入れているので、元の文章とはちょっと違うのかもしれませんが。）
・イベントを超えていくうちに[b]キャラの能力値が少しずつ判明[/b]したり、やる気が上がったり下がったりして愛着が沸くので、死んだときはちょっぴりショックです。でもあっけなく死んでしまいます。
・キャラクター作成や、貯めたポイントを使用して職業を解禁するなどの要素もあり、長く遊べるようになっています。
[h3]こうなったら良いなって思った点[/h3]
・オンラインで人と協力して遊んでみたい。
・選択肢が出てくるイベント中でもセーブしたい。
[h3]コミカル・ドット絵・ローグライクでゾンビをなぎ倒しながらサクサク遊びたい＆サクサク死んでも大丈夫な人におすすめです。[/h3]

184610479.review:
Had a stressful blast getting 100% on this game.

Lots of chaos in the risk/reward of each scenario and many characters to choose from which can make or break a run.

184606868.review:
The combat is a bit clunky and the hit detection isn't immediately obvious and that's a problem because combat is like 95% of what you'll be doing. It's also super random in nailing you with bad events, but the actual ways you deal with the events is very repetitive. I got bored after 30 minutes, it's definitely not worth full price. Also, the maps are very non-sensical, which doesn't really work for a zombie survival game. 

If the combat was more tuned, or at least had more feedback for hits and your status, and the maps were more realistic I'd give a better rating.

184552010.review:
So about 2ish years ago, my gaming laptop's graphics card finally fizzled out, and I didn't play any pc games for about 6 months. This was one of the few games i discovered on my phone that kept me sane for those months; And, clearly, this game is so good i bought it again.
This is a bona fide arcade zombie game. 

    For a funny game with such a cool retro "arcadey" style, BANGING music, and references n jokes galore, if you are caught late at night, and you're not prepared, you WILL have 50 or more (no exaggeration) zombies just PILING through the door. They even "grab" you within a certain proximity, and you HAVE to either hit them away, or RUN away, because if they grab you for those 3 seconds, you will lose some health. If you happen to get caught in the worst-case scenario, your body WILL be swarmed, and eaten alive down to the bones, being reduced to a distraction for the rest of your crazy and... "eccentric" crew to slip through to an exit or the car.

     You collect gas, food, medical supplies, and weapons, and do everything you can in a random neighborhood, full of rubble blocking the roads and some doorways, junk cars, and abandoned, zombie-filled buildings. Every weapon you grab will either be a jab, a swing, a BIG swing (i.e a sledge hammer, knocking multiple zombies down at once), or a *bang bang*, with different damage stats, stamina-usage, and durability. But you're not just limited to your golf clubs and shotguns, you can even pick up furniture, and throw it right at the rotten faces of your opponents! You WILL be doing this, and anything else you can, to hold them off or thin down their numbers just enough to slip through that doorway, survive a siege, and just simply survive.

    Every character you find has a series of stats and traits, including but not limited to: Mechanical (for fixing your car), shooting, Strength, even "loyalty" - aka, how likely they are to NOT leave you behind or betray you when it's opportune for them (when their morale stat is so low they can't take the stress anymore). Along this, they can have 2 traits, they could be a paranoid shooter who has bonus shooting stats, and is always suspicious of people and situations, allowing them to "read a person's" stats before you uncover their stats the HARD way. You could have someone that wants to join your crew, CLAIM to be a mechanic, but your paranoid character reads that they actually have NO mechanical skill WHATSOEVER! You could be an athletic "BERSERKER!!" where you start off with INSANE strength stats, but are cranky, mean to people (which could even get you killed!!!) and DIE in 1 hit! You could have an irritating martial artist, a charming pyromaniac, a sharpshooting gungineer, you can be a dog...

You can be a dog :)

No but actually, you can be a dog. It's amazing, they can only carry ONE thing, in their mouth, but they can still loot, and have the highest speed, meaning you can use them to ZIP past zombies, loot a room, and run back out. 

    I didn't even get into all the possible outcomes you encounter while on the road (or while on foot), and the different possible zombie-riddled locations you can choose based on what materials you need most. For a 15 buck (and currently 3 dollar) roguelike arcade game, it has SO many amazing things packed into this title.
 
    The music will always keep you hooked, every zombie has a very detailed and uniquely-grotesque or funny face, and so many upgrades, traits, perks, and other game modes to keep yourself preoccupied with this title for many, many hours and more. 

    My only complaint taking this game from a 10 to a 9/10 is that there is no online multiplayer support, only couch co-op, meaning your only online option is to use some sort of Remote Play, which is either a huge hit or total miss depending on your internet, hardware, and other weird little factors.

     But if you DO happen to have some friends coming over, I don't care their level of skill when it comes to gaming, EVERYONE is going to have the time of their lives making their way to the grate maple gates of Canada, because I know I already have a blast playing on my own!
